name: New Application in AppCompat
description: A General detection for a new application in AppCompat. This indicates an application executing for the first time on an endpoint.
false_positives: This rule is to explore new applications on an endpoint. False positives depends on the organization.
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.event_data.EventType:Setvalue AND registry.path:*\\AppCompatFlags\\Compatibility\ Assistant\\Store\\*)`
